articles.title: State-run TCIL's 30 pc stake in Bharti Hexacom valued at around Rs 8,900 cr - Economic Times
articles.description: Bharti Airtel holds 70 per cent stake in Bharti Hexacom, which provides telecom services in Rajasthan and Northeast. The government holds the remaining 30 per cent stake in the company through Telecommunications Consultants India Limited (TCIL) .
articles.content:
The government has valued the 30 per cent stake of state-run TCIL in Bharti Hexacom at around Rs 8,900 crore, based on a formula suggested by SBI Capital Markets, an official source said.
